title: Deep Diver

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Water Cooler- (Day) Target a player. At the end of the day, their Attack and Defense for the following night will each be decreased by 1 tier. The target will be notified of this.
Deep Dive!- (Day) [Cheat] Target a player, potentially including yourself. That player requires one extra vote to be lynched today.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Drowning (Passive)- The night after using Deep Dive, your factional attack is increased by 1 tier against anyone who had a vote on the target at the end of the day.
-Water Cooler can reduce Attack to a minimum of None and Defense to a minimum of Vulnerable.
-Deep Dive will be reflexively used if available and you are about to be lynched, unless you explicitly say not to.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Pave the way for a C.O.G.S takeover of the Town! (Normal REF goal)

desc:
Post 4008
*This battle will throw you off the deep end.*
